UNPARALLELED ELEGANCE

unforgettable
ExperienceS

In addition to timeless opulence and world renowned cuisine, we provide an experienced, dedicated in-house team to assist with every step of planning an unforgettable celebration, as well as access to New York's finest vendors. A Pierre wedding offers a couture cake designed by celebrity chef Ron Ben-Israel of RBI Cakes and customized floral displays from renowned event designer Ovando. 

Brides enjoy a private VIP experience including preferred pricing at venerable upscale bridal boutique Kleinfeld's.

A marriage made in heaven begins with a wedding at The Pierre.
